attributes.action: change the current system of rebooking cancelled driving tests due to lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: consider the extra cost involved when the Rebook dates are in four and a half months from now. my daughters test was on the 17/11/2020 but has been given a new test date of the 23/03/21. she has tried to rebook but has been put to the back of the queue . this unfair and unjust!!! someone need to look at this current situation and make a fair change.
attributes.background: reconsider the current structure of rebooking a practical driving test due to cancellation by coved rules. due to current unfair prioritisation structures.

rejection.details: The scheduling and booking processes for driving tests in the UK is a matter for the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA), not the Government or Parliament.
